name: WhichLance
overview:
WhichLance is the only website which offers comparison of online outsourcing, micro-outsourcing, crowdsourcing and freelance marketplaces.

Aimed primarily at SME consumers of outsourcing services it enables them to compare a series of key features of all the major players in the sector at a glance and from a single place.

SMEs considering using outsourcing marketplaces for the first time can use the site to find out which ones best meet their requirements by comparing contenders based on criteria such as the skills and expertise on offer through the marketplace, the fees and charges levied or the safety and security features which are in place.

WhichLance was launched at the end of April 2010. Its founder, Saif Bonar produces a quarterly review of the sector which looks at growth and key developments while comparing the market leaders against various criteria including quarterly and lifetime billings, traffic rankings, usage and media exposure.
